column2: "Hom ntow ndwom fofor mma EWURADZE; Na ɔayɛ anwanwadze. Ne nsa enyimfa na n’abasa krɔnkrɔn edzi nyim ama no."
"EWURADZE ama woehu no nkwagye: Oeyi ne tsenenee akyerɛ petee wɔ amanaman enyim."
"Ɔakaa no mbɔbɔrhu na no nokwardzi wɔ Israel fi do: Asaase ano nyinara ehu hɛn Nyankopɔn no nkwagye."

column3: hom mbɔ ose mma EWURADZE: Hom ntsea mu ntow ehurusi ndwom

column2: "Hom mfa nsankutsen ntow ayɛyindwom mma EWURADZE; Wɔmfa nsankutsen na adwontow ndze."
"Hom mfa akasamu na mbɛn ndze Mbɔ enyigye ose wɔ Ɔhen

column4: na hɔn a wɔtse mu no;"

column2: "Wɔmma nsuyirii mbɔ hɔn nsamu; Wɔmma mbepɔw mbɔ mu ntow ehurusi ndwom
column5: na ɔreba ebobu asaase atsɛn: Obobu wiadze atsɛn wɔ tsenenee mu
